name: Volatile Triangle
description:
Volatile Triangle combines the best aspects of many genres to produce something truly unique. Hardcore puzzle platforming coupled with a trajectory based movement system means the main challenge is simply collecting all of the orbs and getting through the portal without dying. There is the added challenge of getting a perfect score where you use the least amount of moves possible. A perfect score will not be easy to achieve and will take absolute understanding of the game. Understanding the game is something you will have to work for there is no hand holding here.

Prepare yourself this is going to be a long journey.

Features:
-96 levels to master
-Semi-linear progression system allows you to skip tougher levels and come back when your skills are sharpened
-Gravity Switches, Portals, Lasers and more will interact in unexpected ways to form mind bending puzzles
-Control sharing multiplayer makes it easy to enjoy the challenge with your friends
-Play wherever you want with cloud saves and full controller support
-19 Achievements. Achievement hunters beware! These will take some work
-Awesome up-beat soundtrack
